ygData.subject: Sewer Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Since i didn t attach it to the last note my own email address is vanasse@slip.net. And the quests in the aquaducts include among others i assume, finding Ronn
ygData.messageBody:
Since i didn't attach it to the last note my own email address is vanasse@....
And the quests in the aquaducts include among others i assume, finding Ronn Castekin for his sister in Surefall glade, last seen entering the aquaducts with a man in black through the north pond. Finding evidence of the death or whatever of a guards daughter last seen playing in the south pond. Killing the rat king and giving his head to one of the temple of thunder paladins. Delivering a letter to an undercover temple of thunder operative in the bloodsaber temple down there.

Haven't managed any of those. And the bloodsaber guards kill me as soon as i set foot in the door with 100+ dmg hits. So the undercover thing seems a little hard for me to do.

Jaybay
